body:
Hello Lars,






Thank you for your input and good wishes.
CygwinX/WindowsXP seems a good combination for me, at this newbie point
in time. 


Perhaps with time I can fully appreciate the rest what you wrote. 


Veterans will surely be horrified, but at the moment I can only humbly
focus on your...






So I would not worry so much any more about these.






Kind regards,






Angela Giladi
